mapper.insert: insert into USERS( USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_CREATE_DATE) values (user_no_seq.nextval,#{id},#{password},#{email},#{name},sysdate)

insert into USER_AUTH( AUTH_EMAIL, AUTH_KEY)
values(#{email},#{key})
mapper.update: update USERS set USER_AUTH_STATUS = 1 where (select count(*) from user_auth where AUTH_EMAIL = #{email} and AUTH_KEY = #{key}) > 0 and user_email = #{email}
mapper.select: select USER_NO as no, USER_ID as id, USER_PASSWORD as password, USER_EMAIL as email, USER_NAME as name, USER_CREATE_DATE as createDate, USER_AUTH_STATUS as authStatus from USERS where user_id = #{value}

select USER_NO as no, USER_ID as id, USER_PASSWORD as password, USER_EMAIL as email, USER_NAME as name, USER_CREATE_DATE as createDate, USER_AUTH_STATUS as authStatus from USERS where USER_EMAIL = #{value}
